column.name: title
column.value: Today I made my first money as a Programmer

column.name: text
column.value: I sold my laptop.

column.name: title
column.value: Only programmers will get this one:

column.name: text
column.value: Why did the functions stop calling each other? Ans: Because they had too many arguments.

column.name: title
column.value: As a programmer, I would make a UDP joke

column.name: text
column.value: But you might not get it.

column.name: title
column.value: A programmer walks into a bar,

column.name: text
column.value: A programmer walks into a bar, holds up two fingers, and says ''Iâ€™ll have three beers please.''

column.name: title
column.value: What does a programmer wear?

column.name: text
column.value: Whatever is in the dress code.

column.name: title
column.value: If you're a programmer, you would know:

column.name: text
column.value: // the real joke is always in the comments

column.name: title
column.value: What code does a depressed programmer write?

column.name: text
column.value: 'Goodbye world!'

column.name: title
column.value: How do you tell the difference between an English major, a Math major, and a programmer?

column.name: text
column.value: Ask them what '!' is

column.name: title
column.value: A programmer was arrested for writing unreadable code

column.name: text
column.value: He refused to comment

column.name: title
column.value: What did 0 say to 1?

column.name: text
column.value: You're a bit too much
